name: Mint
shortDescription: Launch and manage NFT mints directly from your dGuild.
longDescription: The Mint module enables dGuild admins to configure and launch NFT mints for their community. Supports candy-machine-style drops, whitelist-gated phases, and configurable pricing. Members can mint directly from the dGuild portal.
keyInfo: Configure and launch NFT mint drops
Integrated mint page within your dGuild
